# 18839 - Earls Rise - The Fenton

Faulty floor lamp from the lounge - Lizzy Phipps realise that we have had a while ie over the time period they give us, but it is faulty and not fit for purpose, so we must be pursuing a credit as we have had to replace this with another from stock.  Of course we have it for return for them to test - we tried different bulbs and checked the fuse in the plug too.

Thanks!

author: Suzanne Brandon
text:
Please find flowchart for new returns process

This process is designed to highlight returns to the business as early as possible and to help make decision-making quicker and more efficient by improving visibility and communication. 

It's being tested out this week and we expect to make tweaks as we learn and your input is very welcome 🙂
